projects: [{"title":"Thermal Image Processing","start_date":"Jul 2019","end_date":"Jul 2020","description":"Deceit detection using Thermal Image Processing."},{"title":"VLSI Summer School","start_date":"May 2018","end_date":"Jun 2018","description":"Learned Various blocks of an IC ranging from the Analog Front End to the Digital end in the process of VLSI. Learnt both the idealities and Non idealities in the designing of the Front End Amplifier and The variable Gain Amplifier and worked on the biasing issues faced while designing analog amplifiers by testing various aspects of the theory by simulating circuits on the software LT SPICE."}]
